entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
